<SubscriptionPlans
  subscribedPlan="PRO MONTHLY"
  plans={[
    {
      id: '13707',
      name: 'PRO MONTHLY',
      recurring_price: {
        USD: '10.00',
        GBP: '7.44',
        EUR: '8.74',
      },
    },
    {
      id: '13708',
      name: 'PRO YEARLY',
      recurring_price: {
        USD: '100.00',
        GBP: '74.4',
        EUR: '87.4',
      },
